CallCenterRoutingMap.name: CallCenterRoutingMap
CallCenterRoutingMap.description: Stores a mapping between a user or queue in a Salesforce org to a user or queue in an external system’s call center.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name is a combination of the Salesforce user ID or queue name, and the call center ID, with an underscore between these two values. [SALESFORCE_USER_ID]_[CALL_CENTER_ID] [SALESFORCE_QUEUE_NAME]_[CALL_CENTER_ID]

ExternalId.description: Unique identifier for the external system’s user or queue.

MasterLabel.description: The master label of the CallCenterRoutingMap.

QuickConnect.description: The Amazon Connect QuickConnectId ARN used to determine agent availability for Omni-Channel call transfers. Available in API version 56.0 and later.

ReferenceRecordId.description: Lookup field to a Salesforce user or queue.

CallCenterRoutingMap.accessRules: Salesforce admin privileges or the Customize Application permission
